AWS, CrowdStrike and Nvidia Cybersecurity Accelerator We are launching AWS &amp; CrowdStrike Cybersecurity Accelerator already on September 16th! 00 hour 00 min 00 Sec AWS, CrowdStrike and Nvidia Cybersecurity Accelerator Join the AWS, CrowdStrike and Nvidia Cybersecurity Accelerator, an equity-free program designed to empower global seed cybersecurity startups with product development, GTM and fundraising support. Applications Closed Powered By Previous Speakers &amp; Mentors Daniel Bernard Chief Business Officer, CrowdStrike Bartley Richardson Director - Cybersecurity and Cybersecurity AI, NVIDIA Jessica Alexander Fomer VP Sales at CRWD and CEO of Skematic Matt Nagle Global Leader, Startup Partners, AWS Elia Zaitsev CTO, CrowdStrike Chris Stewart VP Global Technology, Marketplace &amp; Cloud Ecosystem Partners, CrowdStrike Brian Lozada Director of Security of Global Media, Entertainment and Ads Security, Amazon Jenn Reed WW Principal Security PSA, AWS Sukriti Gupta Sr BD AI/ML, AWS Riggs Goodman III WW AI Security Principal PSA, AWS Amit Garay AMER, GTM PDM, AWS Dimitri Maltezakis Vathypetrou Developer Relations - Cloud Providers, NVIDIA Mike Rogers Principal, Winning Frameworks Eliuth Triana Global Lead Amazon Developer Relations, NVIDIA Mike Wilkes NYU Adjunct Professor Ross Haleliuk Cybersecurity Expert Ashok Srirama Sr. Container Specialist Solutions Architect, AWS and NVIDIA Rob Solomon Senior Cloud Solutions Architect – Alliances, CrowdStrike Olga Bermant Senior VC BDM, AWS Dona Haj VC and Startups &amp; EMEA Lead, AWS Tim Albrecht Principal Partner Development Manager, AWS Anna Sarnek Cyber Security Startup &amp; VC BD, AWS Timeline Oct 16, 2025 Applications Open Nov 15, 2025 Applications Close Nov 17-31, 2025 Selection Process Dec 2, 2025 Cohort Announcement &amp; Happy Hour at RIV Jan 5-6, 2026 Accelerator Kick-off (in-person, NYC) Mar 3, 2026 Accelerator Ending Mar 10-12, 2026 Top 10 Selection Mar 22, 2026 Startup Pitch Honing (in person) Mar 24-25, 2026 RSA Startup Nest ABOUT THE PROGRAM The AWS, CrowdStrike and Nvidia Cybersecurity Accelerator is a 8-week equity-free program for seed-stage startups specifically designed to support companies developing cybersecurity technologies in the following categories: Cloud Security Application Security Identity Agentic Security Data Security Other Participation Benefits Showcase at AWS re-Inforce 2026 Winner of the demo day at RSA will have the chance to showcase at CrowdStrike's booth at AWS re-inforce 26 Click for more information GTM Support Co-sell workshops, 1:1 mentoring with experts, Marketplace and APN support to accelerate growth Click for more information Cloud Support 1:1 mentoring sessions with AWS Solution Architects and access to specialized resources and industry specialists Click for more information CISO Mentors Access to CISO mentors providing strategic, experience-driven guidance and support Click for more information Marketing &amp; PR Co-marketing resources and media coverage for selected startups Click for more information Pitching Session Pitching opportunity to investors and ecosystem players through Demo Day Click for more information Ecosystem Engagement Access to wide network of community, VC funds, compliance, technology & innovation experts and more! Click for more information Fundraising Support Become funding-ready with hands-on workshops. Validate your strategy, pitch deck and storytelling and get access to leading VCs Click for more information Alumni Community The community brings together all program members, including alumni founders for both CEOs and CTOs Click for more information Up to 70% Off Participants and applicants are eligible to receive up to 70% off on Falcon Go and Pro Click for more information Tal Kollender CEO &amp; Co-Founder of Remedio &quot;Participating in the AWS CrowdStrike Accelerator Program has truly been a wonderful experience for Remedio. The invaluable content and strategy sessions have significantly boosted our company&#39;s growth. What&#39;s been most rewarding on a personal level is the exceptional mentorship and the opportunity to connect with industry leaders I&#39;ve long admired. It&#39;s surreal to witness their genuine interest and eagerness to help. I feel privileged to be part of this cohort, surrounded by such incredible tech and talent, in a program that&#39;s truly one-of-a-kind.&quot; Resources Terms of Participation Marketing Authorization and Release Last Demo Day Coverage AWS, CrowdStrike and Nvidia Accelerator - Fal.Con 2025 interview AWS &amp; CrowdStrike Cybersecurity Accelerator - Recap Showcase 2:22 min Accelerate your growth with our equity-free startup accelerator! Material presented on this website does not constitute a public offering of securities or investment management services in any jurisdiction. Investing in startup and early stage companies involves risks, including loss of capital, illiquidity, lack of dividends and dilution, and it should be done only as part of a diversified portfolio. The Investments presented in this website are suitable only for investors who are sufficiently sophisticated to understand these risks and make their own investment decisions.
